word:
The True Higher Education. 

     (Part of this are contained in "Counsels to Teachers," pp. 11 ff.) 


                                 Washington, D. C., May 7, 1909. 

To the Teachers in Union College, 
     Dear Fellow Laborers:-- 
     Here are the words I spoke to you Monday morning, April 19, with a few paragraphs from a letter written upon the subject a few days before our visit to College View:--
